text: Marlon Alirio Pérez Arango (10 January 1976 – 4 October 2024) was a Colombian professional road bicycle racer. He rode for the UCI ProTour team Caisse d'Epargne. Pérez Arango was born in Támesis, Colombia. Pérez Arango was stabbed to death on 4 October 2024 in El Carmen de Viboral, Colombia at the age of 48. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:Colombian cyclists
title: Marlon Pérez Arango
